column2:
"Say, <%me>.
Maybe it's for the best that we just leave this place?"
"Oh no no. Ms. Hitsugi and Mr. Enga are involved parties of this conversation. By all means, stay right here."
"Involved parties? What's this about?"
"Likely confirmation status of Oracle's security and control from the panic that Mother Cluster caused, correct?"
"Yes, that's correct. As part of the Intelligence Unit, I cannot let that pass."
"Therefore, It's why I came in person, rather than send Aika or Quna."
"To check if there were traitors amongst ourselves."
"Are you, refering to us?"
"While risking a possible misunderstanding. Yes, that's correct. It's possible that information was leaked from either one of you, or possibly both."
"Ah, that's pretty logical. There's no reason for leaks within ARKS. If anything, it would have to be from Earth."
"You too?!"
"That's not possible. The invasion was built from intelligence gained by Mother's hacking!"
"There's no way ever that there was a possibility that either Mr. Enga or Ms. Hitsugi were involved. I even have the transmission records!"
"Xiera, you shouldn't be riled up by this. We too, have checked the transmission records as well."
"However, conversations without transmissions. A direct conversation isn't out of scope."

"What do you think, <%me>?
As someone who was there, what do you think?"
"Do these two people deserve our faith and trust?"
"1. There's no need to say."
"2. Your accusations have gone far enough."

"Is that so.
<%me>, if you say so, then there's nothing left to say."
"...Heh, is that right?"
"I apologize. Of course, only I could do such a thing."
"Hey, wait a minute Casra! Where are you going?"
"I'm pretty much done with my confirmations, so I'm heading back. I'm sure you've already calculated countermeasures, against invasions like such, Xiera."
"The Intelligence Unit will back your judgement. That should settle things, yes?"
"Ms. Hitsugi and Mr. Enga. I do apologize for my rude behavior."
"I am sorry for testing you, but understand that this is my duty."
"See you everyone. Let us meet again."
"Ugh! Always so aloof. It just ticks me off just watching!"
"Testing us, was he doing something?"
"He was watching our reactions while we spoke, His eyes were serious, talk about creepy."
"His main problem is that he enjoys pitting people against his actions, as if he's devouring them."
"I guess you do need to enjoy yourself in order to keep doing such an awful role."
"Regardless of that, it was still pretty rude. Next time, I'm going to file a complaint against the Intelligence Unit directly from Management!"
